member.name: T:Windows.Management.Orchestration.CurrentAppOrchestration
member.summary: Represents the orchestration for the current app.

member.name: M:Windows.Management.Orchestration.CurrentAppOrchestration.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Gets the current app orchestration for the current view.
member.returns: The current app orchestration for the current view.

member.name: M:Windows.Management.Orchestration.CurrentAppOrchestration.StartSingleAppMode
member.summary: Start the current app orchestration in single app mode.
member.returns: The context in which the current app orchestration has been started.

member.name: T:Windows.Management.Orchestration.SingleAppModeContext
member.summary: The context in which the CurrentAppOrchestration has been started.

member.name: M:Windows.Management.Orchestration.SingleAppModeContext.Close
member.summary: Closes the single app mode context.
